Uses of GL20 in playn.core
 

Methods in playn.core that return GL20
 GL20 Graphics.gl20()
          WARNING: this is a totally experimental, untested feature.
 

Methods in playn.core with parameters of type GL20
 void Image.glTexImage2D(GL20 gl, int target, int level, int internalformat, int format, int type)
          See http://www.khronos.org/opengles/sdk/docs/man/xhtml/glTexImage2D.xml The default implementation is based on getRgb and will hand over a RGBA byte array -- please set the (internal)format and type parameters accordingly -- they are mainly present for future support of different formats.
 void AbstractImage.glTexImage2D(GL20 gl, int target, int level, int internalformat, int format, int type)
          This will work for region, too, because getRGB will respect the region coordinates.
 void Image.glTexSubImage2D(GL20 gl, int target, int level, int xOffset, int yOffset, int format, int type)
          See http://www.khronos.org/opengles/sdk/docs/man/xhtml/glTexSubImage2D.xml The default implementation is based on getRgb and will hand over a RGBA byte array -- please set the (internal)format and type parameters accordingly -- they are mainly present for future support of different formats.
 void AbstractImage.glTexSubImage2D(GL20 gl, int target, int level, int xOffset, int yOffset, int format, int type)
          This will work for region, too, because getRGB will respect the region coordinates.
